EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.GoogleWorkshopConfEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform - Google Cloud Workshop | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Google Cloud workshop <[[springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/google]]> on September 24th in Washington D.C.
Date: Monday, September 24, 2018
Time:
2:00PM to 5:00PM
Room: TBA
Please note, you must be registered for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to attend this workshop.
The SpringOne Platform Team
